name: transferIn
description: Purchase and start or restart transfer process

X-Shopper-Id.description: The Shopper to whom the domain should be transfered

$ul: **currency**: Currency in which the `total` is listed (default: USD)
**itemCount**: Number items included in the order
**orderId**: Unique identifier of the order processed to purchase the domain
**total**: Total cost of the domain and any selected add-ons
**code**: Short identifier for the error, suitable for indicating the specific error within client code
**fields**: List of the specific fields, and the errors found with their contents
**message**: Human-readable, English description of the error
